Nvidia.headline: Nvidia acquires AI startup
Nvidia.content: Nvidia just spent over $900 million to hire Enfabrica CEO and license the AI startup's technology. This move strengthens Nvidia's data-center and AI infrastructure strategy.

Nvidia.headline: Wall Street hits new records
Nvidia.content: Wall Street recorded new highs led by technology stocks. The S&P 500 rose 0.5 percent, while the Dow Jones climbed 0.4 percent.

Tech.headline: Lennar Q3 Results Disappoint
Tech.content: Lennar released third-quarter results that missed expectations, reflecting soft housing market conditions.
